message.content:
I need to identify and extract the specific line items and value of cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment, and other long-term assets from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see that under "Cash Flow from Investing Activities," there is a line item called "Purchase of Fixed Assets" with an amount of 85889.19. This represents the cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment (fixed assets) for the reporting period ending 2024-02-05.

This is the specific line item I need to extract according to the task description.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '85889.19'} }
```
